name: Dialog Information Technology
description:
Dialog Information Technology is one of Australia's leading technology services organisations trading nationally from offices in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Canberra, Perth, Darwin, Hobart and Townsville. Established in 1979, Dialog employs over 850 information technology specialists.
Dialog’s business consultants and technology specialists help organisations get the best from their information technology investment – from short consultancy assignments through to major systems integration, application outsourcing or development projects.
